summary: App layout and TopNav were updated to only include Hero, Quiz, and Closing, effectively removing Letter and Moments from the main page flow and navigation. However, the diff summary shows no new static image assets added under frontend/public/assets/generated, and the provided code excerpts do not demonstrate the required Hero and Quiz photo rendering from /assets/generated paths.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the two user-uploaded photos as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated, and use the second uploaded photo as the main Hero photo rendered from /assets/generated/sona-hero-photo.dim_1600x2000.jpg while retaining existing fallback UI.
missing_requirements.reason: No files were added in the diff ("Added: 0"), and there is no evidence in the shown diffs that the hero image asset exists under frontend/public/assets/generated or that HeroSection was updated to render it from the required /assets/generated path.
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (only composes sections; no asset references)
frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions HeroSection has a photo area but does not evidence the specific new asset/path)

missing_requirements.requirement: Display the first uploaded photo as a smaller side image within the Quiz section, responsive (two-column on desktop; stacked on mobile), with an English alt attribute.
